content.rendered:
MultiMC is a Minecraft launcher developed in an open code that will allow you to enjoy the rounds of this video game much more. It is specially designed for those who want to enhance their gaming experience with different options.

Multiple Minecraft instances

This is the main feature that Minecraft Launcher offers as it allows you to create different instances and customize them according to the user’s preferences. This way you can have different MODs, rounds or texture packs installed without having to constantly install and uninstall add-ons.

These are the main features you will find:

  • Manage multiple Minecraft instances at the same time.

  • Running the game with adjusted resolutions.

  • Set the memory dedicated to Java.

  • Just close the game if it freezes or fails.

  • Customize the icons and groups of instances of the game.

  • It is integrated into Minecraft Forge.

  • Import and export instances to share with whoever you want.
